report.title: Shoresearch notify added surveys
report.description: Notifies Wildlife Trusts when surveys added.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN groups_users gu ON gu.user_id=s.created_by_id and gu.deleted=false JOIN groups g ON g.id=gu.group_id AND g.deleted=false and g.group_type_id=3254 JOIN groups_users gua ON gua.group_id=g.id AND gua.deleted=false AND gua.administrator=true WHERE s.updated_on>'#date#' AND s.created_on>'#date#' AND s.parent_sample_id IS NULL AND s.website_id=121
